MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli , affecting properties in Caernarvon road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:41PM. Our engineers are on site and are making repairs to a broken piece of equipment the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored in stages by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  10:07PM on 13th January 2021.
